title: I never thought I'll be forced to abandon this game.
body: This time this is unistall for good (In summary, i did it like 12 times, lol) See you in season 9, let's hope it will be quite better.  For whole 4 years i enjoyed this game so much. For like 4 months I just feel bad every game. The desing of League is really terrible right now. Time to try out other MOBA's til season 8 in League will end. I really admire everyone who can stand this game right now and don't quit. Im not this strong. I wish that I was.
